mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.qiudui_name as qiuduiName ,a.qiudui_uuid_number as qiuduiUuidNumber ,a.qiudui_photo as qiuduiPhoto ,a.qiudui_address as qiuduiAddress ,a.qiudui_types as qiuduiTypes ,a.fenqu_types as fenquTypes ,a.qiudui_clicknum as qiuduiClicknum ,a.cai_number as caiNumber ,a.zan_number as zanNumber ,a.qiudui_content as qiuduiContent ,a.qiudui_delete as qiuduiDelete ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
